requirements.eligibility: 2nd/3rd year UG CS students graduating in 2026

intelligence.why_it_matters: Direct path to a Pre-Placement Interview for a full-time SWE role at Google.
intelligence.next_action: Perfect your LeetCode Mediums and update your resume for referrals.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus heavily on Graph and Tree traversals for the phone screening stage.

intelligence.why_it_matters: Top rankers in the ML Challenge get direct interview Invites for Applied Scientist roles.
intelligence.next_action: Revise Probability, Statistics, and Linear Algebra basics.
intelligence.prep_tip: Take the Amazon ML Challenge seriously; it is the primary filter.

requirements.eligibility: Enrolled UG/PG students in Indian Institutes

intelligence.why_it_matters: The most prestigious Govt-linked hackathon in India; massive resume weight.
intelligence.next_action: Form a team of 6 and select a problem statement from the official portal.
intelligence.prep_tip: Learn to build a production-ready MVP; judges value scalability over UI.

requirements.eligibility: Any student interested in software building

intelligence.why_it_matters: Perfect for building consistent portfolio projects and gaining global community visibility.
intelligence.next_action: Register on MLH portal and join the Discord server for team matching.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus on 'Learning' tracks—they provide excellent starter code.

requirements.eligibility: Undergraduates in STEM with min 3.0 CGPA

intelligence.why_it_matters: Supports high-merit students in tech; opens doors for R&D internships.
intelligence.next_action: Draft a personal statement highlighting your project contributions.
intelligence.prep_tip: Insider Tip: They look for community impact—mention how your code helps others.

requirements.eligibility: Students 18+ years old enrolled in college

intelligence.why_it_matters: The gold standard for Open Source; extreme value for remote-job seekers.
intelligence.next_action: Join IRC of organizations you admire and start fixing 'Good First Issues'.
intelligence.prep_tip: Start 4 months early. Selection is 90% about your relationship with the community.
